Text: Forgot to mention...issues are PDF files.
Thanks for the upload...these are much better than the butchered older Playboy magazine pdfs floating around out there.

I have the Playboy HD and I'll still DL these. They are great.
In fact, I have the whole collection from '53 to date as magazines. But this is awesome. 

1. My magazines can stay in the wallets.
2. I can put these on the ipad as I please (the PBHDD is VERY Restrictive


Thumbs Up!

Out standing effort =]
Thanks very much and please keep them coming.
